about_the_game:
SPY RUMBLE -Private Game Host


Get the right to host a private room and enjoy Spy Rumble with everyone!

SPY RUMBLE is free to join a private room, but to create a private room, you need to purchase this DLC to get the right to create a private room.

Please note that this is a paid DLC for players of the free version.
If you have already purchased the paid version of "SPY RUMBLE", you have already acquired the right to host a private room.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Core i3-3225 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000; Intel Iris Pro 5200
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: A special gift for all previous users to celebrate going free!
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English
*languages with full audio support
